titles.title: Police Pursuit and Rescue Support Act
To authorize the Secretary of Defense to make military helicopters and other equipment available to State and local governments to assist in emergency law enforcement and rescue operations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Readiness.

bill.summary: 4/12/1999--Introduced. Police Pursuit and Rescue Support Act - Authorizes and encourages the Secretary of Defense to make military helicopters and other equipment of the Department of Defense available to assist State and local governments to perform emergency law enforcement and rescue operation functions. Directs the Secretary to require a State or local government requesting such assistance to submit in advance guidelines concerning the circumstances and procedures under which such vehicles and helicopters are used to pursue suspected criminals or equipment is used to conduct rescue operations.
